tourBios.exmtStatus: Fully Exempt: # Nearest 50 - 31st Web.com Tour qualifier at 2012 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.curYearHigh: Recorded just one top-10 in 21 events, a T7 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship. He made four other cuts to finish the season 121st in earnings.
tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Missed the cut at the BMW Charity Pro-Am (sponsor exemption) and at the South Georgia Classic (Monday qualifier) in his only starts...Earned a sponsor exemption into the PGA TOUR's Wyndham Championship but missed the cut.



2011: Missed the cut at the BMW Charity Pro-Am. 

2010: Played in three Web.com Tour events, missing the cut in all three. 

2009: Missed the cut in all three starts on the Web.com Tour...Played on the eGolf and Hooters Tour. 

2008: Made the cut in 10 of 14 starts and wound up No. 29 on the money list, with a runner-up finish at the Walnut Creek Classic his best performance. 

2007: Made the cut in all 12 starts on the Tarheel Tour and finished No. 24 on the money list, with eight top-25 finishes.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Winner of the 2004 Palmetto Amateur following his junior year at Clemson. Four-year letterman at Clemson, where he was Freshman of the Year for the Tigers when they won the 2003 NCAA Championship. Joined brother, Ben, as one of only two brother combinations in Clemson athletic history (any sport) with national championship rings. Third-team All-American in 2006.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf is having his wife caddie for him at the 2011 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament...Biggest thrill outside golf is shooting a trophy duck...Never travels without hunting magazines...Favorite websites are scducks.com, golfweek.com and pgatour.com...Favorite college team is the Clemson Tigers. Favorite TV shows are "Swamp People," "Gold Rush" and "Man vs. Wild," and his top movies are "Wedding Crashers" and "Shooter." Favorite book is Sunrise on the Santee...Favorite cities to visit are both in South Carolina (Charleston and Belton)...Favorite gadgets are his guns and knives...Bucket list includes duck hunting in Canada, in the Dakotas and in Argentina...Supports the Myer Center in Greenville, S.C.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T7th in 2013 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship Presented by Dr Pepper.
